name: Parable
description:
Parable is a choose-your-own-adventure twine game in the style of a game franchise I love, would love to see more of, and would kill to be a part of.

But you'll never guess what it is, this is a very subtle homage so don't even bother trying to guess, seriously.

Your choices will be remembered throughout the game, and culminate in one of six different endings, that's more than Mass Effect 3.

Created, Written and Illustrated by Luke Woods.

Some audio by Luke Woods, some from various royalty free sources.

Find me on twitter @_cthuluke or email me at lukerawoods@gmail.com, unless you're a weirdo.
